I wish more games pay more attention to realistic reloads.
Not just having 1 animation to represent the perfect "wick flick" either, but ones where the user makes tiny mistakes, and several different animations so there's a bit of variation. Plus slower and even less slick ones for when the player is supposed to be fatigued or highly stressed where a real person is likely to fumble reloads.
